name: Time To Ready
description: Examines current machine state and reports estimated time until it's ready for brewing

Stabilisation.description: Time in minutes after machine has heated up, to be considered truly ready. Only shown here as example

remainingTimeMs.description: number of milliseconds estimated until the machine is ready to brew.

heatingRate.description: The rade at which the machine is heating up.

message.description: The estimate to the machine being heated up, in human readable form
